let me say a few things about Portal, if you don't have GET IT NOW  now that's out of the way I can tell you why you're probably like this game it is a lovely puzzle-solving game it forces you to think on the go you can plan a route at the head but then you have to plan where you the portal in order to get to your goal, and the voice acting don't get me started on the voice acting it's  beautiful,Portal 2 is twice as long as the original so it's not just going to be like a few minutes I believe it takes speed Runners at least an hour to finish the game I think I might be wrong, anyways if you're not convinced then you're fired pack your stuff up and get out, yes I'm talking to you.

Talk about a game outstaying its welcome. Starts great and ends well, but chapters 5, 6 and 7 (of 9) should have been cut, or perhaps merged into a single, connecting chapter. I was halfway chapter 7 about ready to pack it in, what with Valve's standard, drab coloured dreariness at that point outweighing most anything else.

Yet, and as the general opinion goes, I'd certainly still recommend this. The humour is at times great and the game mechanic(s) are, first and foremost, simply to be experienced, even though this second Portal installment may for my tastes add a few too many of those as well, what with the faith plates, light bridges, light funnels and, especially, the various gels. 

Critique notwithstanding, anyone with any sort of interest in games should have and play this. It's interesting, smart and entertaining. Except then for the couple of parts where it isn't. No opinion on the co-op mode.

The second best single player game I've ever played (Marvel's Spider Man is #1) This game is really fun. If you've played portal 1, this game is a must buy. So much content in it. However, it is expensive for a ten year old game. Buy it on sale.

Es lo que fue Portal pero mucho mas mejorado, Profundiza mucho el lore del Universo Half Life-Portal y a su vez, añade nuevas mecánicas a lo visto en el primer juego.
El Co-op es una campaña aparte donde la duración es igual a la principal, así que el doble de duración aún. Teniendo en cuenta que no podés hacer las cosas solo, siempre vas a necesitar de tu compañero para atravesar las pruebas.
Y luego las cámaras de la comunidad hacen este juego casi infinito.
Ojalá hubiera una 3ra entrega para saber que fue de Chell y la humanidad después de esta entrega. O si alguien rescatará a los humanos que GLaDOS encuentra al final del Co-op.
Вобще фууу мне не понравилось

Do some of the old in and out with a bud. Every way you could possibly imagine and some that you will not understand at first. You won't regret it. I definitely recommend both going into the experience never having done it before so it's new and exciting for everyone and so no one feels overpowered. Perhaps later try some Portal 2 together to really cement the friendship.
Класс

I just realized I've never left a review of this game. Obviously, I've got a few hours in- I love playing the story mode, and the Perpetual Testing Initiative means I get to keep playing until people stop making maps! (Which is hopefully never!)

I played this game in 2013-ish, right after I played Portal. I immediately became attached to the characters, the lore, the visuals- it is one of the best games/stories I have ever experienced. It means a lot to me. I hope someday I get to be involved with making something even half as fun, unique, and mind-melting!

Thanks, Valve! I can't wait to see more games, especially having seen the beauty of Half-Life; Alyx!
